fields.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands (C1)
fields.value: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide is increased by 3s.

fields.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance (C2)
fields.value: When Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

fields.name: Hunter's Supplication(C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide by 3. 
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Sentinel Oath (C4)
fields.value: Shortens the Hold CD of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

fields.name: Heterochromatic Gaze (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: The Overflow (C6)
fields.value:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals AoE Hydro DMG equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP. 
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
